channel.title: OS on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in OS on IT技术分享

item.title: Centos8安装docker
item.description: 使用dnf添加docker源 dnf config-manager --add-repo=https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo dnf repolist -v dnf list docker-ce --showduplicates | sort -r 安装docker dnf install docker-ce --nobest start systemctl enable --now docker systemctl status docker 添加用户到docker组 usermod -aG docker $USER id $USER 关闭防火墙

item.title: Win7旗舰版永久激活密钥 Windows7正版密匙
item.description: 安装好windows7系统后右击计算机–属性–更改产品密匙 输入以下密匙; RHTBY-VWY6D-QJRJ9-JGQ3X-Q2289 HT6VR-XMPDJ-2VBFV-R9PFY-3VP7R 6K2KY-BFH24-PJW6W-9GK29-TMPWP或22

item.title: git 导出干净包
item.description: git archive master | tar -x -C /somewhere/else Most of the time that I need to ‘export’ something from git, I want a compressed archive in any case so I do something like this. git archive master | bzip2 >source-tree.tar.bz2 ZIP archive: git archive –format zip –output /full/path/to/zipfile.zip master

item.title: curio9无限试用
item.description: Curio.app 就是利用cache，反复刷试用而已

item.title: swift

item.title: 误删chrome书签，恢复方法
item.description: <p style="color: #5e6a72"> %LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome\User Data\User Data\Default\ </p> <p style="color: #5e6a72"> Windows XP/2003: </p> <p style="color: #5e6a72"> %USERPROFILE%\Local Settings\Application Data\Google\Chrome\User Data\Default\ </p> <p style="color: #5e6a72"> 举个例子：C:\Documents and Settings\用户名\Local Settings\Application Data\Google\Chrome\User Data\Default </p> <p style="color: #5e6a72"> Mac: </p> <p

item.title: SPDY简介
item.description: PDY是什么？ SPDY是Google开发的基于TCP，TLS的网络协议，用来传输web内容。HTTP2.0的第一个草案就是以SPDY为蓝本。

item.title: Fiddler抓包
item.description: Fiddler是最强大最好用的Web调试工具之一，它能记录所有客户端和服务器的http和https请求，允许你监视，设置断点，甚至修改输入输

item.title: Burp Suite抓包
item.description: Burp Suite 一款相当不错的抓包工具，推荐使用 **urp Suite是一个Web应用程序集成攻击平台，它包含了一系列burp工具，这些工具之间有大量接口可以互相

item.title: 移动社交社区MocoSpace的架构
item.description: This is a guest post by Jamie Hall, Co-founder & CTO of MocoSpace, describing the architecture for their mobile social network. This is a timely architecture to learn from as it combines several hot trends: it is very large, mobile, and social. What they think is especially cool about their system is: how it optimizes for device/browser fragmentation on the mobile Web; their multi-tiered, read/write, local/distributed caching system; selecting PostgreSQL

item.title: 移动社交社区MocoSpace的架构
item.description: MocoSpace.com 是一家移动社交网站，有1200多万注册用户，每个月30亿的 PV ，是美国最大的移动社区。我们来看看 MocoSpace 是如何来架构他们的网站的。先来看看他们的统
